meanings.definition: A small jumping plant louse that feeds on the sap of plants.
meanings.sent1: The psyllids were hopping around the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of psyllids on the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The psyllids seemed to be having a tiny dance party on the stem.
meanings.sent4: The psyllids were like tiny sap-sucking acrobats on the plants.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the tiny psyllids jumping from leaf to leaf.
